mapper.insert: INSERT INTO tb_book (bookTitle, description, author, publishingHouse, book_id, sex,publicationDate) VALUES (#{title}, #{description}, #{author}, #{publishingHouse}, #{bookId}, #{sex},#{publicationDate})
